```{r, output = FALSE, load necessary packages and read in the data}

library(tidyverse)

library(stargazer)

whale_data <- read_csv("HW3Data.csv")

```

Linear regression
1 = Votes yes
0 = Votes no
    
```{r, do the linear regression}

whales_lm <- lm(vote ~ risk + bid + NEP + income + age, data = whale_data)

summary(whales_lm)


```
